Posts.Content: jferrante wrote: I was recently prescribed the oral chemo Xeloda by my oncologist for metastatic breast cancer that has spread to my bones.  I have completed one week and have a week off before starting my second week.  The major problem I am having is nausea and diarrhea even after being off the drug for 4 days.  I read this morning that one of the ingredients is lactose and I am lactose intolerant.  Has anyone had a similar problem and was it resolved?  I don't want to stop this medication as it is the best option for me without being on IV chemo for the rest of my life.
